name: moderator
description: Can monitor and manage content/users within a defined scope

name: staff
description: Internal team member with elevated access for operational tasks

name: project_manager
description: Oversees project assignments, timelines, and team members

name: team_lead
description: Leads a smaller group, assigns daily tasks

name: developer
description: Has access to development tools and code repositories

name: qa_tester
description: Can test features, log bugs, and access staging environments

name: support_agent
description: Handles customer service tickets, can read/write support cases

name: report_viewer
description: Can access analytics and reports but cannot modify data

name: data_entry
description: Can input and update certain types of records

name: auditor
description: Can view all system data for compliance but cannot edit

name: api_consumer
description: Has API keys and integration permissions

name: content_creator
description: Can create and manage content like blog posts or pages
